name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fetchy - A Free and AI Powered Web Scraping Tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A no-code and AI web scraper collects data from any web and exports it into ready-to-analyze spreadsheets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Core Features:
- User-friendly interface requiring no coding skills.
- Automates crawling and scraping of multi-page websites.
- AI-powered web structure recognition for optimal scraping.
- Supports various data types for large-scale dataset access.
- Straightforward data exports to multiple formats like CSV.
- Auto Anti-Scraping Detection to avoid getting blocked.

Common Use Cases:

- Amazon Price Monitoring: Track pricing and trends for Amazon retailers and distributors.
- E-commerce Review Monitoring: Analyze customer reviews on platforms like Lazada and Shopee.
- eBay Market Analysis: Monitor and analyze competitor activities for small businesses on eBay.
- Local Business Optimization: Scrape maps and directories like Yelp to increase the chances of finding potential customers.
- Lead Generation from Google Maps Data: Utilize Fetchy to extract business information, including contact details from Google Maps.
- Real Estate Listings Monitoring: Quickly gather estate information from Zillow, RedFin estate agent, or broker websites.
- Job Market Monitoring: Track new job postings for job seekers on targeted employment sites.

Fetchy is an AI-powered web scraper that automates your data collection process. With just a few clicks, Fetchy's AI detects website patterns and determines the optimal scraping strategy for you. Experience the easiest and fastest web scraping ever - no code required. All collected data is automatically exported to Microsoft Excel spreadsheets, ready for analysis.

Fetchy is your go-to tool for boosting business growth through data-driven insights.

Please let us know if you have any feedback or feature requests:

hello@fetchy.bot
